channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: NY investment bank says 'crypto winter is over,' bullish outlook for Coinbase
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Analysts from NY investment bank H.C. Wainwright say that Coinbase is uniquely positioned to benefit from the upcoming crypto bull run.

item.title: US House Financial Committee Republicans look for records to show crypto debanking
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The lawmakers see a “coordinated strategy” to deny the digital asset industry access to banking that is not related to a desire to protect banks.

item.title: Arkham denies buggy Mt. Gox alerts to blame for 7% Bitcoin price crash
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Blockchain analytics firm Arkham Intelligence has denied playing a role in the flash crash that saw Bitcoin fall 7% in less than an hour.

item.title: Metaverse division's $4B loss drags on positive first quarter for Meta
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Zuckerberg expects Reality Labs operating losses to increase year-over-year in 2023.

item.title: MeWe social network with 20M users to integrate with Polkadot parachain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The integration is built on DSNP, a protocol created by Project Liberty.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren wants the police at your door in 2024
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By J.W. Verret
item.description: Senators Elizabeth Warren and Roger Marshall want to make your crypto wallet illegal — and their plan runs contrary to the principles they campaigned on.

item.title: Silicon Valley-based tech accelerator expands its digital asset vertical to France
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Plug and Play Tech Center will add crypto and digital assets to the list of verticals in its Paris office, where it will help startups network with consumer brands.

item.title: Web3 social media protocol launches ‘layer 3’ to provide instant posts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new layer relies on Bundlr, a decentralized storage platform built on Arweave, for mass storage of social media data.

item.title: Bahamas securities watchdog presents comprehensive new draft digital assets act
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: After the FTX scandal focused the international spotlight on it, the Securities Commission of The Bahamas completes its regulator overhaul.

item.title: Romania to launch national NFT marketplace: Nifty Newsletter, April 19–25
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Sotheby’s auction house is set to sell NFTs that are part of collapsed crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital’s digital collection.

item.title: CertiK to launch compensation plan for $2M Merlin DEX exploit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hermi De Ramos
item.description: The Web3 security firm urges the rogue developer to return 80% of the stolen funds and offers 20% as a white hat bounty.

item.title: South Korea’s sweeping crypto bill passes first regulatory hurdles
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Legislators in South Korea passed a first-phase review of proposed cryptocurrency regulations that include relatively harsh sentencing recommendations.

item.title: Arbitrum decentralized exchange IAO cancelation draws controversy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Xirtam token's scheduled initial airdrop offering was canceled at the eleventh hour following an alleged pricing dispute.

item.title: SEC’s war on crypto: How far will it go?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: The latest Cointelegraph Report tries to make sense of the Security and Exchange Commission's ongoing crypto crackdown, its rationale, and the potential outcome.

item.title: Binance.​US enables Web3 domain creation for American users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Binance users based in the United States are now able to create Web3 domains that serve as digital identities in a new partnership with Unstoppable Domains.

item.title: First Republic Bank dives another 20% with Bitcoin ‘ready for $40K’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price targets are reaching past the recent 10-month highs with Bitcoin bulls emboldened by First Republic losses.

item.title: Bitcoin touches $30K as BTC bulls well-positioned for weekly $3.2B options expiry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: A weaker U.S. financial system has raised BTC bulls’ odds of profiting $780 million on April 28 options expiry.

item.title: The rise of AI and the impact it could have on the music industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Victoria Kennedy
item.description: The impact of AI technology on the music industry is undeniable, and the future implications remain uncertain.

item.title: Shirtless shitposting and hunting SBF on the meme streets: Gabriel Haines, Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Gabriel Haines can most likely be found screaming about crypto with his shirt off in public or at home. Why is that and who is he?

item.title: 5 YouTube channels to learn Web3 development
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: If you’re looking to learn Web3 development, discover five YouTube channels to help you assist through the journey.

item.title: Circle launches cross-chain USDC transfer protocol for Ethereum, Avalanche
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new protocol burns coins on the sending chain, and mints new ones on the receiving chain.

item.title: Productization of Web3: Barriers to enterprise adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nitin Kumar
item.description: While Web3 is gaining adoption and scaling in enterprises, its productization at scale has several barriers.

item.title: Can artificial intelligence prevent the next financial crisis?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: This article explores whether AI can prevent the next financial crisis by improving risk management and identifying potential threats.

item.title: Deloitte on a crypto hiring spree, reveals LinkedIn job postings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Deloitte highlights its commitment to Web3 and crypto through its intent to hire cryptocurrency experts to join its team, with over 300 positions posted on LinkedIn.

item.title: Why anonymity is key to self-autonomy — And how crypto helps freedom movements win
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan DeYoung
item.description: The Agenda podcast chats with DarkFi to explore how Rojava is experimenting with cryptocurrency and why encryption and anonymous spaces are critical for building self-autonomy.

item.title: UK pledges nearly $125M to create ‘safe AI’ taskforce
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The British government has pledged 100 million British pounds ($124.8 million) in funding to support a task force for the development of “safe AI.”

item.title: Bitcoin at banks: Raiffeisenlandesbank to offer crypto investment services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: All RLB NÖ-Wien clients will be able to invest in a broad number of cryptocurrencies with a budget of as little as one euro.

item.title: Blockchain features on WEF whitepaper as a tool to fight climate change
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: CISA executive Brynly Llyr said that it’s important to consider and research emerging technologies that can help address climate change.

item.title: The Sandbox partners with Ledger Enterprise to secure metaverse businesses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: As part of the partnership, all NFTs in The Sandbox's collection wallet will be transferred to the Ledger Enterprise wallet.

item.title: BTC price gains 6% as First Republic Bank drama delights Bitcoin bulls
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin continues to benefit from unfolding nerves over U.S. bank stability as a BTC price short squeeze becomes possible once more.
